answers.answer: Yes I had my baby at 37 weeks and he is doing wonderful good luck!!!!
Yep preclampsia I had it and was induced. Good luck.

I had preeclampsia with my son and had him at 36 weeks 4 yrs ago and was in bed rest for a month before that. I am 36 weeks now and just found out today I have early signs again and begin the 24 hr urine test in the morning . Good luck to you!

question: Had a Dr appointment today they found protein in the urine but my blood pressure was normal, there having me do a 24 hour urine test, and if the result are the same they might have me induce 37 weeks. Is that possible?
title: protein in urine but no hbp
